page.title: 14ALRESFORD EVENTS
page.content: {Alresford Fair:}For about 400 years Broad street has been Home each October to the Fair. The street is filled with excitement and Candyfloss! But now it has moved from its traditional place to Alrebury Park off the road and into a field, it doesn't seem the same. {Gymkhana:}For several years now Perin's School has organised a very popular Horse and Dog show in July. {Alresford Show:}Each September sees the large and important Agricultural show. {Carols:}Every Christmas there are carols around the Tree in Broad street. {Round the Houses Run:}Once a year there is a fun race around the houses of Alresford. {
